org.springframework.http.converter.json.Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder

Packages that use Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder
Package
Description
org.springframework.http.converter.json
Provides HttpMessageConverter implementations for handling JSON.

    Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder

    Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
    Alternative to Jackson2ObjectMapperBuilder.annotationIntrospector(AnnotationIntrospector) that allows combining with rather than replacing the currently set introspector, for example, via AnnotationIntrospector.pair(AnnotationIntrospector, AnnotationIntrospector).
